casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Frank BOWEN. No. 342P05-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, William C. Young, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*902The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of July 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Rehearing and En Banc by the North Carolina Supreme Court Duly Elected Justices":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of August 2006."
